name: Sieve
headline: Video AI for Developers
description:
Sieve is a specialized cloud built for video / audio AI.

Every video product today is being overwhelmed by a ton of new use cases that are enabled by AI. Video is unique in that it’s much more compute and data-intensive to process or generate compared to other modalities. This leads to a ton of complexity around the ways models are run, the kinds of extra processing needed to happen around them, and the complexity of pipelines that solve the most valuable use cases in the modality. To this end, Sieve’s strongest and most immediate value proposition comes from being an AI toolkit that solves problems unique to video — unlike generic AI developer tools that might exist today.

Video is just the start however. Learn more about our long term vision [here](https://sievedata.com/about/jobs)!

founders.name: Mokshith Voodarla, Founder
founders.description: Mokshith is co-founder and CEO of Sieve. Mokshith used to work on computer-vision problems at Scale AI, NVIDIA, and Ford where he experienced first-hand, the difficulties of building and scaling vision-based analytics systems. Before that, he graduated from UC Berkeley with a B.S. Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. Mokshith found his love for computer-vision on his high school robotics team, where he also met Abhi. Mokshith deeply enjoys orange chicken.

founders.name: Abhinav Ayalur, Founder
founders.description: Abhinav (Abhi) Ayalur is the co-founder and CTO of Sieve. Abhi leads technical design and development along with steering the overall company vision. Abhi's previous experience includes stints in computer vision, data analysis, and API development at Second Spectrum, NVIDIA, Microsoft, and Niantic. Abhi graduated UC Berkeley with a B.S. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. In his spare time, Abhi loves to play the alto saxophone, eat good food, and play basketball.

##### High quality
Drastically cut R&D time. Our pipelines are built to be trusted in production out-of-the-box.
##### Built-in flexibility
Access the right levers over cost, quality, speed, and functionality based on your use case.
##### Large solution library
A single platform to handle many use cases, reducing third-party vendor overhead.
##### Custom deployments
Orchestrate existing pipelines or run custom GPU workloads with a simple deployment flow.
##### Extreme scale
Automatically scale compute power to process hundreds of millions of media files per day.

## Powering a variety of use cases
#### [Creative and Social PlatformsShip world-class AI features with production-grade pipelines and modular infrastructure designed for video.Learn More →![Hero](https://sievedata.com/solutions-page/creative-and-social-platforms/hero.svg)](https://sievedata.com/</solutions/creative-and-social-platforms>)#### [Model DevelopersProcess large video datasets with reliable pipelines for collecting, filtering, and annotating internet video.Learn More →![Hero](https://sievedata.com/solutions-page/model-developers/hero.svg)](https://sievedata.com/</solutions/model-developers>)#### [Media CompaniesProcess existing media libraries with high-quality pipelines that can analyze, repurpose, and reformat content.Learn More →![Hero](https://sievedata.com/solutions-page/media-companies/hero.svg)](https://sievedata.com/</solutions/media-companies>)
### Used by Industry Leaders
Built for teams at the bleeding edge of video AI
![Quote](https://sievedata.com/graphics/quote-open.svg)
Kaiber uses Sieve for our production AI video gen workloads. Our end-to-end shipping speed would be notably slower without Sieve, as they handle so many common, yet complex requirements out of the box. In addition, their team is exceptionally communicative and have always worked quickly to address our feedback.
Eric Gao, CTO
![company logo](https://sievedata.com/logos/kaiber.svg)
![Quote](https://sievedata.com/graphics/quote-open.svg)
Zight uses Sieve to power all our production AI capabilities. Our team loves the fact that Sieve is one roof where all our video AI features can live under. It allows us to move at unparalleled speed from prototype → production.
Phin Hochart, Head of Product
![company logo](https://sievedata.com/logos/zight-testimonial.svg)
![Quote](https://sievedata.com/graphics/quote-open.svg)
Sieve helped us scale large data workloads and train state of the art generative models. They are super responsive to custom requests and were a great partner to work with.
Naeem Talukder, CEO
![company logo](https://sievedata.com/logos/moonvalley.svg)
![Quote](https://sievedata.com/graphics/quote-open.svg)
We chose Sieve because it worked seamlessly out of the box—just input a video, and it delivered the exact format we needed with excellent quality. The developer experience was also exceptional, making it a clear choice for us.
Archie Edwards, Senior Software Engineer
![company logo](https://sievedata.com/logos/veed.svg)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sieve**

Founded in 2022 and nestled in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Sieve is an innovative startup focused on harnessing the power of video AI for developers. As a proud member of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Sieve aims to address the unique complexities inherent in video processing and generation, setting itself apart from generic AI tools.

**Mission**

Sieve’s mission is clear: to provide developers with a robust AI toolkit that simplifies the intricate workflows necessary for handling video and audio data. In the current landscape where video products are increasingly inundated with diverse AI use cases, Sieve offers specialized, high-quality solutions tailored specifically for this medium.

**What Sieve Does**

Video processing is notoriously compute-intensive, leading to convoluted pipelines when developers try to implement features like dubbing, background removal, or active speaker detection. Sieve’s API provides access to optimized video pipelines designed for hundreds of specific use cases, streamlining development and significantly reducing time-to-market. Their solutions are built to work right out of the box, enabling teams to focus on innovation rather than the complexities of video AI.

Sieve is building an extensive library of pipelines that cater to various industry sectors, such as creative platforms, model developers, and media companies. Their offerings include features like:

- **Dubbing**: Natural-sounding translations of video/audio content.
- **Auto Crop**: Intelligent cropping of video content to focus attention.
- **Visual Moderation**: Automated content review to ensure compliance with standards.
- **Audio Enhance**: Improving audio quality for clearer sounds.

**Why It Matters**

As video becomes a dominant medium across social media, education, and entertainment, the ability to understand, manipulate, and generate video content efficiently is becoming crucial. Sieve is at the forefront here, trusted by over 1,500 companies ranging from startups to industry leaders, enabling them to ship production-grade AI features with unprecedented speed.

**Future Vision**

While their current focus is on video, Sieve sees this as just the starting point. They are keen on expanding their capabilities and exploring new use cases in complementary fields of AI, ensuring they remain ahead in this rapidly evolving space.

You can learn more about Sieve and explore their technology on their [website](https://sievedata.com/). Whether you're a developer looking to integrate cutting-edge video features into your products or an enterprise seeking efficient solutions to manage media workflows, Sieve stands ready to help you navigate the complexities of video AI with ease.
